text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1983. ==Events== ==Debuts== *7 March - Balão Mágico (TV series) (1983-1986) ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== *4 June - Fernanda Paes Leme, actress, TV host & director *26 November - Sheron Menezzes, actress *14 December - Igor Rickli, actor *16 December - Raphael Viana, actor ==Deaths== ==See also== *1983 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1983
title: 1983 in Brazilian television
